name: Hinges
summary:
在遍布机械和玩偶的发条之城中，
每个机械人从初始的一片空白，到获得姓名，衣物。
他们会选择一只小淘气玩偶作为陪伴，然后进入城市，获得工作。 
我们的主人公欧莉奥，也经历了相同的过程，
但在选择小淘气时，她选择了芭布，一只问题多多的小淘气。
除了惹是生非以外，他所带来的麻烦，还远不止如此...

HINGES is a fantasy webcomic, turned graphic novel, about a doll named Orio and her troubling companion Bauble.
New to the city of Cobble, Orio must depend on help where ever she can find it, but her assigned familiar Bauble has other interests. And as the two explore the walls of their city, they find that they are not the only new arrivals.
In a place that runs like clockwork, it only takes a little disruption to upend a city.


http://meredithmcclaren.storenvy.com/collections/498187-hinges
https://imagecomics.com/comics/series/hinges
info:
• 中文名: 姣恋人生
  • 册数: 3
  • 出版社: Image Comics
  • 别名: Hinges Book One : Clockwork City
  • 别名: Hinges Book Two : Paper Tigers
  • 别名: Hinges Book Three : Mechanical Men
  • 发售日: 2015-03-10
  • 作者: Meredith McClaren
